pages.text: The command focus allows the caster to command a servant to move towards a position. If used on a creature, it will move to the creature's location, but if the creature is a mount, most servants can ride on it.

To use the command focus, it must be equipped in a wand/staff. Then the caster must right click the wand/staff on a servant to start commanding it. The caster can shift-right click into the air to remove the servant from the command focus.
The servant can still move, even if it's on Standing By mode. To dismount a mounted servant, shift-right click on it with an empty hand.
